name: One Night at Andrew's
description:
This game was made to surprise my friend named Andrew with a crappy game for fun. I uploaded it here just in case you are curious. There are 3 characters;  Andrew, flip, kop. If Andrew comes to the door, just close it. If flip starts to appear on the window, shine the light on him. If Kop appears close to the vent, close it. There is a power and air meter.  

Also it was made in under 12 hours in total so don't expect much.
